meanings.sent1: The loud noise seemed to discombobulate the cat.
meanings.sent2: The tricky riddle can easily discombobulate young children.
meanings.sent3: Trying to solve the puzzle only served to discombobulate him further.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected plot twist in the movie discombobulated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The complex instructions managed to discombobulate even the experienced chef.

meanings.sent1: Her constant criticism would always discombobulate him.
